name: Infected Restaurant Adventure
description:
Infected Restaurant adventure is my  first completed java game.  Feel free to comment with any criticisms, bugs, or other helpful info.  I made it with java using this guy's video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G5yr4sekAI0 for the most part.  It was originally started as a learning project so it's pretty short. 

Thanks for playing!

I can be reached at adept_44@live.com and I'm always looking to learn , teach, and/or collaborate.
